inclusion.criterion: life expectancy of greater than 2 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: age greater than or equal to 18 years old
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: SGOT and SGPT value less than or equal to 2.0-fold greater than the upper limit of normal
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: bilirubin less than or equal to 2.0 mg/dL
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Karnofsky Performance Status greater than or equal to 70%
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: central nervous system disease as assessed by clinical examination
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Hepatitis B surface antigen positive and Hepatitis C antibody positive patients
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: patients who previously received murine monoclonal antibody therapy
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma and is currently experiencing progressive lower extremity weakness and urinary retention. The patient's condition may be contraindicated for the trial due to central nervous system disease.
